Text: hm, pitty for me. Doesn't work here. :-( getting the message: 'error! patching unsuccessfull' after dragging bento to the cracker and hitting 'patch'.
tried it again. I had bento 2 installed so i 'zapped' it  away with appzapper. No way. Still not working. What's up doc?

oh oh, i see! :-) From the read Me 1st: How to use it?

Launch the cracker. Drag&drop Bento 3 into the cracker-window.
Quit the cracker.
Launch Bento 3 and type in the serial from the screenshot. Process ready.
You can now use Bento w/o any nags.

i will add to this: DON'T hit the patch button once you dropped bento into the cracker... :-)
now it works.

System Requirements
Mac OS X 10.5.7 or later
867MHz PowerPC G4 processor or higher
512MB of RAM (1GB recommended)

(NO Tiger)
getting same unable to patch error....
